title: Mount Rushmore National Memorial: Kids & Youth
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth             Kids & Youth       Be A Junior Ranger Know Your Government Going Green For Kids Kids Fun Page How Big Are The Heads? Become a Web Ranger at the National Park Service online WebRangers program. Have fun while you explore and learn about more of your national parks by visting the National Park Service Kids page.  Mount Rushmore Student Guide Hello kids, you can view and download the Mount Rushmore student guide. This guide will provide you with some great information about the idea, the people involved, the presidents, an informative timeline, animals and plants, and park facts.
